b'Xiao Lu He Xiao Lan':
b'"I've been holding a few words back for a long time \xe2\x80\x94 I like you!"
"Beryl and Sapphire" is a popular manhua created by artist Ocarina. Here includes protagonists with the most random names in history  \xe2\x80\x94 the mild-mannered Beryl (Green) and the easily-embarrassed Sapphire (Blue). At times the closest of friends, at others the worst of enemies\xe2\x80\xa6 In this donghua where each episode is set in a different world, how would they encounter each other time and again?? Only angst? Too painful! Nothing but fluff? Too sugary! Come watch B&S, the show where you'll never guess the ending\xe2\x80\xa6

(Source: Guodong Subs)'
